description:
“So what’s a good time for you like?” I asked.
“Well,” Darius thought for a moment. “It usually involves me with my shirt off!”
“That’s not a bad thing!”
“Yes, I love the outdoors,” he said. “Playing sports, running around, enjoying the sunshine... I’m usually shirtless.”
Darius has an incredible muscular body so I wasn’t surprised that he isn’t shy about it.
One thing that was surprising coming from this stud... he’s scared of spiders! Like, really scared!
We were doing some photos under a bridge and when a cobweb hit his face he kind of freaked out!
“Ohhh,” he said after jumping off the perch we had him on. “They really freak me out!”
title: Darius
